exceptions.tactic: apply is_series_ext with (a0 := fun n => plus (a n) (opp (b n))).
exceptions.exn: The reference b was not found in the current environment.
The LHS of opp_plus (opp (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros H1 H2. apply is_series_ext with (a0 := fun n => plus (a n) (opp (b n))). - intros n. rewrite opp_plus. reflexivity. apply is_series_plus. - apply H1. - apply is_series_opp. apply H2.
